Articles.Content:
I love colonies, and bases. I also make to many requests. But who cares. 

I would love a lot of cool creative colony modules, rovers, greenhouses and other supplies. I can build some but it would be awesome to see what others can build. 

Also, if anyone who builds these can make internals (Made out of wings and MK3 bays and stuff).

No need for lifters or Launchers.

Anyone who builds this or takes time to read, thank you.

DMSP

Get your creativeness on!

This gives me an idea..... un momento...

That thing needs more Science.

hmmm i think i have an idea on how to make hollow bases that could connect to eachother- it's quite simple but and will build it soon but i contemplate on the usefulness of fairings as they are closed on at least one side. well back to wing pars then

Well, just sent Bill to the Mun in a Ion hybrid lander, and 4 more crew in a Dragon replica will join him (Once I do Trans-Munar Injection)

I used a Nautilus-X replica recently. It got into Mun orbit, but the Nuclear Motor overheated. The spacecraft was an Ore Carrier, and was part count heavy. The centrifuge was taking up space too. It had two drop-pods, one of which I had used to return a Kerbal I rescued. I got Barra Kerman (Engineer) and she hit the weak-spot (Some reaction wheels) and knocked off the whole Ore stack. She survived. The drop-pod didn't. However, the maneuver saved around 150 parts. Now the crew needs to be rescued.

Just a small story.

The base is doing fine.
